text: Nanda (8 January 1939 - 25 March 2014) was an Indian actress. She appeared in Hindi and Marathi movies. Her best known roles were in Chhoti Bahen (1959), Teen Devian (1965) and Gumnaam (1965). She retired in 1995. She was born in Kolhapur, British India. Nanda died from a heart attack on 25 March 2014 at her home in Mumbai, India. She was 75 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian child actors
title: Nanda (actress)
